about_the_game: The Rough Justice: '84 Original Soundtrack (OST) contains 18 tracks with over 37 minutes of neon-noir retro-synth vibes. This soundtrack was composed and performed by Raouf Djeffel, whose work can be heard in trailers and promos for Star Wars Andor, The Umbrella Academy, Call of Duty Warzone, Halo Infinite, The Handmaid's Tale, The Expanse, and many more.
